title: can i get 15 orange essence pls.. ?

replies.body: We try to help when we can, though in this case, hextech items are not something that's granted.  Just keep playing and grab some mastery chests!  You should be able to grab some more essences in no time!  Good luck!
Noone can helpy ou with that not even riot you will need to wait for the next skinshard.
